title: Tahm Kench is so absurdly broken
body:
His Q is fine. 

His W is absolutely broken. His W not only counters every assassin/burst champion in the game, but it has a 6 second cooldown, yeah SIX SECONDS cooldown on an ability that counters EVERY assassin in the game. Not only that but it also has the luxury of dealing 32% of any enemys MAXIMUM HEALTH with no damage items at all. 

Did I mention his E gives him two health bars??

Oh and he gets free damage from building health on his autos and abilities, cuz you know, why the fuck not?

His W needs a massively increased cooldown.
